Hamas official to Reuters: We haven't given response to Gaza truce proposal, still being studiedHamas received the Paris truce proposal for a ceasefire and release of hostages in Gaza but did not give a response to any of the parties, the media adviser to the head of political bureau of the Islamist movement, told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 19:49:28 GMT SXEAMICPOBMKTDWKZ75VX7WVPA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-official-reuters-we-havent-given-response-gaza-truce-proposal-it-is-still-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
US Central Command says two ballistic missiles launched from Houthi-controlled areas likely towards M/V KOI ship in Red SeaTwo anti-ship ballistic missiles were launched from Houthi-controlled areas in Yemen, likely towards the M/V KOI ship in the Red Sea, the U.S. Central Command said in a statement on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 19:41:31 GMT B7P6LIBHXFLAROAWI2OQPLU5NI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-central-command-says-two-ballistic-missiles-launched-houthi-control-areas-2024-02-01/Reuters世界
Russian strike kills two French aid workers in southern Ukraine-governorA Russian strike killed two French volunteer aid workers on Thursday in the southern Ukrainian region of Kherson, the regional governor and other officials said. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 19:29:19 GMT LBF4CLXTH5KQTCDVQQC3L636U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-strike-kills-two-french-aid-workers-southern-ukraine-governor-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Canada to delay assisted death solely on mental illness until 2027Canadians suffering solely from mental illness will remain excluded from pursuing assisted death until 2027 because the health care system is not ready, Health Minister Mark Holland said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 19:16:31 GMT UNXTNXAOYBKFVN7E2IM5UFXV4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-delay-assistance-death-solely-mental-illness-until-2027-2024-02-01/Reuters世界美洲
EU leaders isolated Orban to seal Ukraine aid dealTo get Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban to end his block on a 50 billion euro ($54.3 billion) aid package for Ukraine, other European Union leaders teamed up ahead of a crunch summit to deliver a stark message: You're on your own this time. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 19:09:50 GMT手5WT5MVIEDPYWFFMTFIOQBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-leaders-isolated-orban-seal-ukraine-aid-deal-2024-02-01/Julia Payne, Jan Strupczewski, Sabine Siebold世界欧洲
Alberta restrictions for transgender youth 'extremely dangerous' - Canada ministerCanada's health minister on Thursday said planned restrictions for transgender youth in the Western province of Alberta are "extremely dangerous," a sign that policies could become a political wedge issue going into next year's election. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 18:56:21 GMT BV7NGBSOX5L3ZE2AQNCZ44EXIY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/alberta-restrictions-transgender-youth-extremely-dangerous-canada-minister-2024-02-01/Steve Scherer世界美洲
Slovaks ratchet up protests against government's criminal law reformTens of thousands of people attended rallies across Slovakia on Thursday against plans by Prime Minister Robert Fico's government to scrap the office that probes high-profile financial crimes, including cases close to the premier. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 18:47:28 GMT 4VUOVN5BO5O5FK4ULVDBDBDUMU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/slovaks-ratchet-up-protests-against-governments-criminal-law-reform-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli forces have killed 10,000 Gaza fighters, minister saysIsraeli forces have dismantled the Hamas brigade in Gaza's southern Khan Younis as part of an almost four-month-old war in which 10,000 Palestinian fighters have been killed and the same number wounded, Defence Minister Yoav Gallant said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 18:35:13 GMT NV7HAONHH5LBZIPHX3AW5N3NJA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-forces-have-killed-10000-gaza-fighters-minister-says-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
IMF backs Milei's reforms, says risks to Argentina's $44 bln loan program remainThe International Monetary Fund said Argentina is committed to accumulating international reserves and stemming a central bank financing of government debt under the latest review of its $44 billion loan program, as the global lender backed a set of reforms proposed by President Javier Milei's new administration. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 18:26:18 GMT E2FWWX2TN5J47J3MQZSPNELV3A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/imf-backs-mileis-reforms-says-risks-argentinas-44-bln-program-remain-2024-02-01/Rodrigo Campos, Jorgelina Rosario世界美洲
Ukrainian army chief sets out priorities in article amid uncertainty over his futureArmy chief Valeriy Zaluzhnyi laid out a set of priorities for Ukraine and named challenges blighting the country's war effort in an opinion piece published on Thursday after several media outlets reported that he could be dismissed from his post. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 18:16:56 GMT 2GLE2IC72ZPSLAKNA63F65HMQY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-army-chief-sets-out-priorities-article-amid-uncertainty-over-his-2024-02-01/Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Russia has no plans to deploy nuclear arms beyond Belarus, says deputy ministerRussia will not deploy nuclear weapons abroad except in its ally Belarus but will find ways to counter any deployment of U.S. tactical nuclear weapons in Britain, the deputy minister in charge of arms control said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:01:34 GMT C7O2GLZFYZN6FBBA66WELYNREU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-no-plans-deploy-nuclear-arms-beyond-belarus-says-deputy-minister-2024-02-01/Dmitry Antonov, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
